headline.main: Crisis Nears in Bataan; Japanese Attempt at a Mortal Thrust Is Based on Attrition as Well as Assault

lead_paragraph: The repeated and persistent attacks against the defenders of Bataan, signalized again yesterday by air raids on Corregidor and sharp skirmishes along the land front, plainly represent an attempt on the part of the enemy to conclude as quickly as possible the campaign of Luzon.
abstract: H W Baldwin on P I situation
